snippet: The need to accommodate bigger airplanes and a growing number of foreign carriers has helped spur many of the new investments.
abstract: Nation's biggest airports, at a time when federal and state public works programs are stalled, are in the midst of major renovations or expansions that, taken together, amount to some of the largest infrastructure projects in the country; the need to accommodate bigger airplanes and a growing number of foreign carriers has helped spur many of the new investments.
lead_paragraph: The need to accommodate bigger airplanes and a growing number of foreign carriers has helped spur many of the new investments.

headline.seo: At U.S. Airports, Building Boom Takes Hold
